TopicTitle: Falcon - Most agile plane I've built

Articles.Content:
The Falcon is the most agile plane I've ever built...

- It can do a very tight u-turn at mach 1

- It has a ridiculous amount of lift

- Lots of fuel

- Can easily pull out of a dive even if you're 200 meters from the ground going mach 1

- Very stable

- No need for airbrakes...

![cNSmBBM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cNSmBBM.jpg)

[More Here](https://imgur.com/a/QY5UV)

[Download](http://www./download/w4mcj4aqaay1xx3/Falcon.craft)

(WARNING: Do not use if you have mods that will cause sudden deconstruction of your craft at high g-force...)
